[00:00.00]Worldwide Beautiful - Kane Brown
[00:04.75]Lyrics by：Kane Brown/Shy Carter/Ryan Hurd/Jordan Schmidt
[00:09.50]Composed by：Kane Brown/Shy Carter/Ryan Hurd/Jordan Schmidt
[00:14.26]White churches black churches
[00:17.62]Different people same hearses
[00:20.85]It's kinda hard to fight with each other
[00:24.29]Laying down in the ground six under
[00:27.30]At every show I see my people
[00:30.66]They ain't the same but they're all equal
[00:34.26]One love one God one family
[00:39.39]You're missing every color
[00:42.38]If you're only seeing black and white
[00:45.69]Tell me how you're gonna change your mind
[00:48.51]If your heart's unmovable
[00:52.45]We ain't that different from each other
[00:55.68]From one to another I look around
[01:00.22]And see worldwide beautiful
[01:06.79]Thank God thank God thank God thank God thank God thank God
[01:13.04]Oh thank God thank God thank God thank God thank God thank God
[01:20.62]Coast to coast city to city
[01:24.00]Reach out your hands if you're with me
[01:26.85]Still got some work but we still got a dream

[00:09.50]//
[00:14.26]白教堂 黑教堂
[00:17.62]不同的人 同样的结局
[00:20.85]相互敌对 有点痛苦
[00:24.29]长眠于六尺深的地下
[00:27.30]每一场表演 我都会看到我的朋友
[00:30.66]他们各有各的不同 但他们都是平等的
[00:34.26]同样的爱 同样的神 都是一家人
[00:39.39]你会错过多彩的世界
[00:42.38]如果你眼中只有黑与白
[00:45.69]告诉我 你要怎样改变你的思想
[00:48.51]如果你的心固执难移
[00:52.45]我们彼此之间没有那么大的不同
[00:55.68]我环顾四周 观察每一个人
[01:00.22]看到了美丽的世界
[01:06.79]感谢上帝
